Description: Fragment of a wall-painting; head of Inherkhau and wife.
Curator's comments: Published: PM I Part 2: p.xxiii Keller in Davies, Colour and Painting, London 2001, p. 86, col. pl. 28 [1].
From Chamber F, snorth wall. Published; J-P. Corteggiani and N. Cherpion, La tombe d'Inherkhaouy (TT 359) a Deir el-Medina (MIFAO128, 2010), 62-82, pl. 52
Bibliographic references: Parkinson 1999 / Cracking Codes: The Rosetta Stone and Decipherment (fig. 49)
Additional IDs: Other BM number: EA5614 (original Big Number)
